document.full_text: prosecutors said on wednesday they had detained former president hosni mubarak and his two sons for 15 days to face questioning about corruption and the use of violence against protesters.
document.title: prosecutors order mubarak and sons held
lines_and_colors: prosecutors said on wednesday they had detained former president hosni mubarak and his two sons for 15 days to face questioning about corruption and the use of violence against protesters.
